title: PES CSE VS RV ISE (both thru cet) pls comment on why u wud choose one over the other

comments.body: Can someone tell me what's the major difference between ISE and CSE and how much % of the curriculum is similar?
Idk about similarity in syllabus but normally the average placement package of ISE is higher than CSE. And also a lot of times ISE students gets the highest package
Rv is rv it has brand name 10x better than pes, peer group is also far far better

RV ISE any day but check out the campus. ISE block is located near the hostels and when I visited on Saturday there was a foul stench of urine. Not sure if this is an exception but the location of ISE classroom can discourage those who are looking for clean class rooms

I'm pretty sure there are a lot of incoming students voting here. There's very little difference between these two colleges. Personally I chose PES CSE over RV ISE because I had gotten more reviews of PES: I had a better picture of it going in. But you'll be well off in both choices.

Also, I spoke to a prof at Columbia University, he told me that it in India, ISE and CSE may mean the same, but that's not the case over there.
That's strange coz one of my seniors completed he's bachelors degree in RV (ise) and he's doing his masters in a very good university in USA
Literally same but for PESUðŸ˜‚ like I said, you'll be well off with both choices. But I had both choices and chose CSE at PES RR.

Ok , so i seem to be in a similar position as u are .. so could pls give me an honest review abt PES CSE ? It might be a vague question but ig as a person who went thru the same situation,you might know what I'm asking abt. Pls do tell me which year u r in right now if u don't mind
